pages.privacy-policy: StarlightTerrace Privacy Policy - Safeguarding Your Personal Information StarlightTerrace HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact Privacy Policy For StarlightTerrace Hotel (hereinafter referred to as Hotel), respecting and protecting your personal data is a commitment. We understand that you care about your personal data. This Personal Data Protection Statement describes the personal data the Hotel collects about you, how we use and protect your data, and the options you have regarding our use of this data. Who we are StarlightTerrace Hotel is part of bluegr Hotels & Resorts, a private family-owned company founded by CEO Gina Mamidakis. Our aim is to elevate luxury holidays with exceptional service, hospitality excellence, and breathtaking locations. Contact us by post at the above addresses, by e-mail at starlightterrace@gmail.com Which personal data we collect about you Data for the rendering of services: We collect personal data whenever we interact with you. This may include: Customer Details: Name, ID number, contact information, billing data, etc. Personal Data: Date of birth, nationality, etc. Stay Details: Arrival/departure dates, room number, preferences, etc. Health Data: Allergies, medical conditions, etc. Device Data: Unique device IDs, IP address, etc. Usage Data: Interaction with our services, browser cookies, etc. Underage Data: Name, nationality, and date of birth, provided by a guardian. Fellow Travelers’ Data: When booking for others, we collect their personal data and preferences. Obtain their consent before sharing their data. Surveys: We may request demographic or personal data in customer surveys. During your stay: We collect additional data during registration, including data required by law. We may use CCTV and other security measures on our premises. We also collect data related to services such as reception, gyms, spa, activities, childcare, and equipment rental. Events: If planning an event with us, we collect event details and data about your guests. We may share your data with event organizers and third-party service providers, as permitted by law. Social Media: If you engage with us on social media, we may collect data from your social networking account, with your permission. Employment Applications: If you apply for employment electronically, please refer to our Applicant’s Private Data Policy. Personal data from third parties: We may collect data about you from third parties, including partners in airlines, card payments, social networking services, and other third-party sources. pages.terms-conditions: StarlightTerrace Terms and Conditions - Guidelines for Using Our Services StarlightTerrace HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact Terms & Conditions Welcome to StarlightTerrace Hotel. By accessing and using our website, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions. Use of Website This website is for your personal, non-commercial use only. You agree not to use this website for any unlawful purpose or in any manner that could damage, disable, or impair the site. Reservations and Cancellations Reservations made through our website are subject to availability and confirmation. Cancellation policies vary by room type and rate plan; please review the specific policy at the time of booking. Payment All prices are quoted in local currency and are inclusive of applicable taxes. Payments can be made using major credit/debit cards. The Hotel reserves the right to pre-authorize your card prior to arrival. Check-in and Check-out Check-in time is from 2:00 PM, and check-out time is by 12:00 PM. Early check-in and late check-out are subject to availability and may incur additional charges. Liability The Hotel is not liable for any loss, damage, or injury arising from the use of the website or services provided, except in cases of gross negligence or willful misconduct. Privacy Policy Your privacy is important to us. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for information on how we collect, use, and protect your personal data. Amendments The Hotel reserves the right to amend these terms and conditions at any time without prior notice. Please review this page periodically for any updates. Governing Law These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the country where the hotel is located. Any disputes arising out of or related to the use of this website will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that country. Contact Us If you have any questions about these terms and conditions, please contact us at: StarlightTerrace Hotel Address: Taj East Gate Rd, Paktola, Tajganj, Agra, Uttar Pradesh 282001, India Email: starlightterrace@gmail.com Phone: +91-257-698-2255 The StarlightTerrace website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site.
